thread.title: The Man Who Bets Tencent’s ‘Moonshot’ Money

author: Alyssa Abkowitz
title: The Man Who Bets Tencent’s ‘Moonshot’ Money
text:
BEIJING—Chinese internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. says it wants to improve the world through technology. David Wallerstein is on it.

Mr. Wallerstein, 43, is Tencent’s chief exploration officer. The unusual title reflects his mission: To find so-called moonshot investments that could lead to big payoffs down the road.
